trends: There have been no other sightings in Clayton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi went outside to play basketball. while i was out there, i saw 2 very distinct lights that were there. they were brighter and a different color than all the stars around it. i'm a ufo fan, i watch a bunch of ufo shows and research ufo's, so i figured this was my first lucky moment. i go get my ipod 4g because it has an hd camera on it. it couldn't see the lights very well, and neither could my digital camera. so all i could do was sit there and watch. these lights were moving foward. as they moved up, they spread farther apart from each other. then they both got extremely bright, and shot up into space. the only thing left that i could see was a little cloud behind. and at least 5 minutes after they left, it got very wind, and it wasn't windy at all before that. if your wondering about the picture, since i couldn't take a picture, i just made one. i took a picture from the internet that looked like it. they were purple, and when they lit up, they turned a dark red. the white slashes are stars around it. sorry it was poorly made in like 5 minutes. if anyone has any questions e-mail me at *(email address deleted--cms\sg).
